duties_responsibilities.duty: Product merchandising: Handle all aspects of product merchandising within assigned stores using a handheld mobile device to replenish, straighten, and track inventory.
Store employee and customer interaction: Interact with store employees, store management, and customers in a professional manner while in the store.

Holiday Support: Increase work hours before and after holidays such as Valentine's Day, Easter, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Halloween, Thanksgiving, and Christmas. May be required to work on the actual holiday for Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, and Father's Day.

Department Remodels and Resets: Work on activities including building fixtures, moving card departments, installing fixtures, product, and remodeling card departments. Typically receive at least a 2-week notice for remodel/reset work.

Physically demanding job: Requires a high level of energy and a sense of urgency. Work on the selling floor and in back stockrooms, pushing, pulling, lifting, and carrying cartons, merchandise, and display fixtures throughout the workday.

Access to Wi-Fi network and internet. Able to operate handheld technology provided to open and read documents and interpret information. Flexibility to work a changing schedule, reliable transportation, eligibility to work in the United States, and ability to read, understand, and communicate in English. Required to work the week before and the week after major holidays.
